author: Xbox
description:
On this episode of the Official Xbox Podcast, we're at Gamescom in Germany, and we're diving deep into the weird and eclectic game, There Are No Ghosts at The Grand. This game has everything! From creative decorating to spooky mysteries, FPS battles to puzzle solving, and even singing! Yes, singing! But probably not ghosts... right?

00:00 Introduction
00:53 What is No Ghosts at the Grand?
02:04 Power tools
03:47 Player choice
04:50 Beyond the hotel
05:52 The musical of it all
08:08 Supernatural secrets
10:43 New uses for power tools
11:36 Day and night cycle
12:43 Unrevealed game mechanics 
14:27 How is there so much in this game?
16:45 Can you decorate anywhere?
17:46 Unique exploration areas 
19:36 Final thoughts
20:17 Outro  

Listen to us on Spotify/Apple Podcasts 🎧 
https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/officialxboxpodcast 

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

https://www.instagram.com/xbox/

title: No Ghosts at the Grand Deep Dive | Official Xbox Podcast

author: Xbox
description:
METAL EDEN is officially out now on Xbox Series X|S!

From Reikon Games, creators of RUINER, and published by Deep Silver, METAL EDEN delivers an adrenaline-fueled sci-fi FPS experience like no other.

In METAL EDEN, you play as ASKA, an android built around a digitized human mind, fighting for truth in a fractured, post-human world. Explore the decaying techno-planet Moebius, descend into the world below, and battle for control over the souls of a lost colony, now stored in cybernetic COREs.

With your sentient spacecraft Nexus by your side, expand your arsenal, upgrade your body, and face a relentless roster of enemies in an escalating war for what’s real, and what’s worth saving.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/metal-eden/9pp1whrp17bk

author: Xbox
description:
Set coordinates for the Terminid Hive Worlds – and pack the extra-strength bug spray. We’re exterminating the galaxy’s most disgusting infestation in a patriotic payback mission of no mercy. 

Abhorrent new enemy types, thrilling missions, strange worlds and spectacular beasts await the bravest Helldiver units. Did somebody call pest control?

Dive now in HELLDIVERS™ 2 today and prepare to inject a dose of managed democracy to enemies of Super Earth.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/helldivers-2/9MX9WN9DFPGT
